question.text: You are following a large vehicle approaching crossroads. The driver signals to turn left. What should you do?

explanation.text: Hold back and wait until the vehicle has turned before proceeding. Do not overtake because the vehicle turning left could hide a vehicle emerging from the same junction.

answer.text: Overtake if you can leave plenty of room
Overtake only if there are no oncoming vehicles
Do not overtake until the vehicle begins to turn
Do not overtake when at or approaching a junction
